name: Growth Foundation of India
briefDescription: We believe in a holistic 360-degree development with a focus on three verticals Environment, Education and Health & Nutrition. This model empowers our communities with the capability of creating choices for themselves and their families, allowing them to transform their own lives and ensuring a permanent and irreversible change for good.We have been working with the slums in New Delhi, We have partnered with various communities in the slums and have a good base in the field of education. Also our area of focus is also towards creating employment through skill development programs. We also believe that senior citizens are the pillars of our nation and hence setting up an community between them through an Old age home.
